thread.title: Anthonia James
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Anthonia James

author: Anthonia James
title: Anthonia James
text: I have been buying frames from this company over 5 years now, the service is great. The customer service are so helpful, when my 85 year old mother was here last year on vacation, I purchased a frame for her which was back log, they called me immidiately to let me know when the frame will be available, and when I will receive the shipment. Thanks for the good work.
